name: Max emblem
description:
First playable alpha.

Turn based strategy game based on environmental damage and makeshifts firearms.

Each character gets two weapons slot and a random set of miscelanous items.

As of now the game has no real goal and is simply a proof of concept for a future game.

Every single furniture, character or corpse can be pushed around, thrown or blasted away by explosion. this deals damage to whatever gets hit and can even cause a chain reaction when the receiver is pushed away.

This system is entirely homemade and use a tile based reaction system rather than physics.

Interacting with an object push it away 1 tile. Dynamite however  can blast it up to 4 tiles away.

Characters can trade items between each other as well as with storage furnitures and corpses.

Most items are currently useless except ammunitions but a future use is already in store for every one of them.
